front.title: PDAD-OLSR: Passive Duplicate Address Detection for OLSR

abstract.t: This draft proposes PDAD-OLSR, a solution for configured addressuniqueness maintenance in MANETs running the OLSR protocol. Itutilizes the Passive Duplicate Address Detection (PDAD) concept,which enables nodes to passively detect duplicate addresses in thenetwork (e.g., occurring after network merging) by analyzing receivedrouting protocol messages. Due to its passive nature, PDAD-OLSR isvery efficient in terms of bandwidth consumption. Moreover, it canprevent the contamination of routing tables with wrong routinginformation resulting from address conflicts.
